name: Super Mario Bros. S: Road To Infinity
name_original: Super Mario Bros. S: Road To Infinity
description:
Super Mario Bros. S is a collaborative fangame, meant to embody the spirit of modern Super Mario platformers while utilizing the style of SMB1. Super Mario Bros. S: Road to Infinity is the first Unity version of this game (all versions before this one were developed using Scratch).

Run as far as you can in an infinitely-generating level! Collect coins and moons to buy powerups such as the iconic fire flower and ice flower and the custom blade star, and defeat both familiar and custom enemies to earn more time. As you run, you'll face increasingly dangerous foes and obstacles, so be prepared!

Features:

  • Showcases the new Super Mario Bros. S engine
  • Widescreen (16:9)
  • Infinitely- and randomly- generating level
  • Two playable characters (Mario and Luigi) with different abilities
  • Gameplay support for Nintendo Pro Controller
  • Automatic saving in-browser

Controls and credits are listed in-game.

 This version's main purpose is to showcase new engine and game features. In future versions of Super Mario Bros. S, Road to Infinity will be updated and incorporated as a new gamemode (how exactly this will be implemented is still unknown). This engine is still very early in development, so any feedback would be greatly appreciated.
